introduction.p: This document provides a guide to operating a bicycle, tailored to the user's experience level. It includes both theoretical knowledge and practical instructions.

user_input_validation.p: The manual begins by gathering information about the user, including age and prior cycling experience. Age is validated to ensure it falls within the range of 4 to 100 years. Based on experience, the manual adapts to provide a more detailed introduction for novice riders.

item.value: Yes/No. Determines the level of introductory material.

experienced_riders.p: If the user indicates prior cycling experience, the manual proceeds directly to the practical section, assuming a baseline level of knowledge.

novice_riders.p: For users with no prior experience, the manual provides a detailed introduction, followed by a knowledge check before proceeding to practical instructions.

knowledge_check.p: Incorrect answers result in repetition of the introductory material.

practical_instructions.p: Regardless of experience level, the practical section guides the user through the steps of preparing and operating the bicycle.

conclusion.p: This manual provides a comprehensive guide to bicycle operation, adapting to the user's experience level to ensure a safe and enjoyable ride.
